level-compare-forks.description: Run benchmarks on different level-forks and see how they compare.

level-log.description: Log all [levelup] operations, including method calls.

debugdown.description: Log all operations made on an [abstract-leveldown] compliant store. For node and browsers.

level-dump.description: Dumps all values and/or keys of a [levelup] or [level-sublevel] instance to the console.
